meanings.definition: A drink, especially an alcoholic one.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, I enjoy sipping on bevvies with my friends.
meanings.sent2: The party was lively with everyone enjoying their bevvies.
meanings.sent3: At the wedding, the bevvies flowed freely, making everyone merry.
meanings.sent4: The bar was stocked with an endless variety of bevvies to choose from.
meanings.sent5: The bartender recommended trying their special bevvies for a unique taste experience.

meanings.definition: A group of drinks, especially alcoholic ones.
meanings.sent1: The host prepared a selection of bevvies for the guests to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The pub offers a great deal on bevvies during happy hour.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was filled with delicious bevvies for the outing.
meanings.sent4: The festival had a tent dedicated to exotic bevvies from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The yacht party boasted a luxurious spread of premium bevvies for the guests.
